item.title: Creating a Portfolio Website with Hugo and Deploying on GitHub Pages
item.description: As part of my Human-Computer Interface class, I was tasked with creating a blog to showcase my work during my master’s program. I opted to build my website using Hugo, a fast and modern static site generator.
